My ads are still pending after three work days

If your ad is still pending after three business days, it might be due to your account being new and not yet verified. Could you please provide the following details?
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we have this information, we can conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. You can also email these details to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
93 Depot St Readsboro Vt 05350
Aristara

My ads are still under review and it has been four days now, I haven't heard from you team and I am concerned that the ads will be posted too late for Mother's day and will be a waste of money for me.

I understand your concern about the delay in ad approval, especially with Mother's Day approaching. Typically, the ad approval process takes between 1-2 business days. Since it's been longer for you, it might be due to verification issues. Could you please confirm if your account is new? If so, I recommend providing the following details to expedite the process:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Please email these details to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification. This will help our team conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
If your account is not new or you've already provided this information, please let me know so I can assist further.
I did provide all of the information yesturday

I recommend keeping an eye on your email for any updates from our team. If you don't hear back soon, feel free to reach out again, and I'll do my best to assist you further.
thank you

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
my next ad is supposed to be active today and it isnt

Let's figure out why your ad isn't active yet. Could you please provide me with the campaign start date, bidding type, and any recent changes you've made in the last 72 hours? This information will help us troubleshoot the issue.
start date is 5/15 and it is a new ad after my other ads were never active

Since your ad is new and hasn't been activated, it might be due to business verification issues. Please provide the following details: Company's full address, Company's legal entity name, Account Email, Company's EHID or DUNS number, Primary contact person's name, and Company's phone number. Once we have this information, we'll proceed with the verification process.

I have done all of this already with my last set of ads but there was never any activity to verify my business. $10.00 was taken from my bank account and was replaced a few days later

It sounds like there might have been a temporary authorization charge. This $10 charge is a standard procedure to verify your payment method, and it gets refunded if no ads are run. Since you've already submitted your business verification details, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They can provide more specific insights into your account status and help resolve any pending issues.
